reviews.review:
[h1]Bioshock Infinite[/h1]


[b]"Bioshock Infinite"[/b], ein geiles Spiel !
Anders als im ersten und zweiten Teil, findet man sich in einer großen Stadt in den Wolken wieder, mit einer anfangs fast schon göttlichen Austrahlung.
Den Versuch mit Booker DeWitt zu wagen, in eine schöne aber auch grausame Welt einzutauchen, um ein mysteriöses Mädchen zu helfen, offenbart sich als eine der schönsten Storys.
Doch nicht nur die dramatisch Story, auch das Gameplay überzeugt, wie man es von einem Bioshock Spiel gewohnt ist.
Außerdem, lohnswert zu erwähnen ist, dass der Soundtrack wohl einer der besten ist, die ich je gehört habe.

세일할때 8000원 정도에 샀던것 같은데
이 게임은 내가 지금까지 해본 스토리 겜중에서 단연 최고라고 말할 수 있다.
필자는 바이오쇼크에 대한 개략적인 것만 나무위키에서 주워듣고 게임에 입문 했으나
설정이나 아트워크같은 부분들이 너무나 마음에 들어서 좋았다
시리즈의 전작인 바이오쇼크 1과 2를 하지 않아도
인피니트는 별개의 이야기이기 때문에 진입장벽이 낮다.
그러나 인피니티를 한 사람치고 1과 2를 안할사람은 없다

Este es un juego estéticamente bello, el entorno y la ambientación son espléndidos y sus mecánicas son muy divertidas; con sus aerocarriles y sus múltiples armas que te ofrecen infinitas posibilidades diferentes de eliminar a tus enemigos. La historia se va destapando poco a poco y llega a su punto álgido al final. Cuenta con unos personajes con carisma que conforme avance la aventura te atraparán sin remedio para siempre en esta especie de fantasía de masacre steampunk yanki de principios del siglo XX.

Si os gustan los juegos con personalidad mi opinión es la siguiente: Kooompreem Kooompreem

I very much recommend this game.  It is confusing as all hell, and I needed to look at the wiki to understand what in the heck just happened, but once it got all cleared out and I was able to put the puzzles together...this game is mind-blowing.  And not just in the fact that you can do some pretty interesting things to heads, and enemies in general...but I thought the story was fantastic, and the gameplay was hectic and a lot of fun (though that last mission man...that last mission...grah!)
我根本不知道这是什么剧情，都是赶着向前跑，完全莫名其妙.
Mindblowing Visuals, Twisted Gameplay & Beautiful Story!

Bioshock Infinite is beyond video game.
It is pure ART.

This is arguably one of the most unique Bioshock games in the franchise but in a good way. Despite the theme of the other 2 games being so different this game just simply works. The visuals still hold up fairly well to this day and the story kept me playing until I completed the game. I would highly reccomend this game to anyone (even if they have never played bioshock before)

Шедевр игроиндустрии!

Un excelente juego que no pierde calidad con el tiempo, todo lo contrario. Con sus gráficas semi-caricaturescas y su estilo retro este juego ha logrado mantener una jugabilidad estética y dinamica en todo  momento. Por otro lado su trama es excelente, muy profunda y un tanto compleja que además se mezcla con la cronología del mismo juego y de entregas anteriores. En mi humilde opinión, este juego lo tiene todo, gráficas atemporales, excelente jugabilidad, trama atrapante, un diseño de personajes y de escenario ilustre y un protagonista memorable.

Nice Game but no Bioshock, im shocked that the Game gets rated so high when comparing to all the cut Content and Features and a big step backwards to its predecessors. There isnt more to say about it, this Game has more in common with typacial lazy Call of Duty then a System Shock follow up namely Bioshock. With this rating we will never see a Game like Bioshock 1 and 2 ever again and thats really sad.

Simple look it through, no crafting, no hacking, no research, no exploring,  ok but unengaging Story, small linear Areas nice to look at but boring, no creep and claustrophobic, lacking Powers and boring Powers, but the worst of all are the Enemies what are 99% all generic Humans only with a pretty dumb AI.

I give it a negative rating because of all the cuts, for the huge step backwards, delivering a total different Product as shown and advertised based on the Gameplay footages shown and then still call it Bioshock. 

So sure its an ok Game surely worth playing one Time atleast but if you expect a Bioshock you will get dissapointed.

Is the story as good as the original Bioshock?  No, its an interesting story, but does not draw you in the way the original trip to Rapture did.  Is the world as good as the original Bioshock?  I'd say yes, it may not have the same place in my heart as the sunken city of Rapture, but the sky city of Columbia is alive and interesting.  Overall a fun and beautiful game.
